azurerm_site_recovery_replication_policy.description: Manages an Azure Site Recovery replication policy on Azure.

name.description: The name of the network mapping.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group where the vault that should be updated is located.

recovery_vault_name.description: The name of the vault that should be updated.

recovery_point_retention_in_minutes.description: The duration in minutes for which the recovery points need to be stored.

id.description: The ID of the Site Recovery Replication Policy.

create.description: Used when creating the Site Recovery Replication Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the Site Recovery Replication Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Site Recovery Replication Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Site Recovery Replication Policy.
